function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on inaccurate information from social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive advice in risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased utilization of urban green spaces during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traveling long distances to access risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compliance with governmental mobility restrictions leading to reduced visits to green spaces","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxed
